basics.name: Jethro Pesquera
basics.label: Cybersecurity Professional & Founder
basics.summary: Cybersecurity professional focused on hands-on experience, red teaming and incident response with a hacking mindset.

work.name: Self-employed
work.summary: Designed and implemented an AI-assisted email triage system achieving functional inbox zero.
highlights: Designed and implemented a full email triage and routing system for key inboxes
Reached functional inbox zero with high-signal messages surfaced and junk filtered
Set automation boundaries to preserve edge-case visibility
Delivered weekly reports on inbox activity and automation status

work.name: Self-employed
work.summary: Conducted founder-led discovery for SaaS ideas and launched an MVP.
highlights: Conducted founder-led discovery across multiple SaaS concepts
Mapped ecosystem segments and refined positioning based on adoption barriers
Built and launched an MVP, receiving positive feedback
Leveraged AI-assisted workflows to accelerate product iteration

work.name: Arctic Wolf

highlights: Triaged security events across network, endpoint and log data

work.name: The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints
work.summary: Performed playbook-driven incident response and developed automation scripts.
highlights: Performed incident response using EDR, SIEM and OSINT tools
Developed Python scripts to automate SOC processes
Created triage techniques for high-demand periods

work.name: Various Organisations
work.summary: Provided IT support, managed knowledge bases and led small teams.
